item.title: Intention Detection and Gait Recognition (IDGR) System for Gait Assessment: A Pilot Study
item.description: Intention Detection and Gait Recognition (IDGR) System for Gait Assessment: A Pilot Study intention定义: standing still(stationary), walking or ascending the stairs Hardware sensors: ADXL345 (an accelerometer; in pelvis unit) and four FSRs (two in each foot for heel and toe respectively) Algorithm gait adaptation: detect in which phase of the gait cycle the subject is adaptive frequency oscillators (AFO) $\Leftarrow$ Since the human gait cycle is periodic, the acceleration signals obtained from the pelvis unit is also periodic in nature.
